randoop

Class JunitFileWriter

  • Object
    • JunitFileWriter

  • public class JunitFileWriter
extends Object
    Outputs a collection of sequences as Java files, using the JUnit framework, with one method per sequence.

    • Field Summary

      • createJunitTestFiles

        public List<File> createJunitTestFiles(List<ExecutableSequence> sequences)
        Creates Junit tests for the faults. Output is a set of .java files. the default junit class name is the driver class name + index
